stories.text: By and large the targeting results from Facebook feel a lot like they did 10 years ago (i.e. bad). Probably not a big deal for brand marketers but for those of you reliant on the platform for discovery what direction are you heading?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are you doing now that Facebook’s targeting has gone back to 2014?
Can you get pwned with CSS?
U.S. Air Force spy plane takes spotlight in empty Ukraine airspace
New discovery supports reusable helmet padding (liquid nanofoam)

stories.text:
I’m one of the co-founders of Pigeon Loans (W22). We made a smarter way for lending and borrowing between friends, family, and people in your community.

On social media (Twitter, Facebook, reddit) people will randomly ask for help or complain about a loan situation they are dealing with. We are often able to DM these people and bring them to our platform at a very high rate. The challenge is manually looking for all these conversations.

Current tools are bringing in too much noise (a lot of irrelevant conversations). We are willing to pay for someone to build an effective solution for us as it will bring in real business. Perhaps even one that uses machine learning and GPT-3 to get better over time.

Let’s chat if you have an idea or a product you can point us too.
stories.title: Looking for tool or someone to build slack tool for social media listening
